io.github.techgnious

Class IVCompressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.techgnious.IVCompressor

  • public class IVCompressor
extends java.lang.Object
    Base Class to handle compression or conversion of Image/Video Files Operations supported: Resize Image Convert Image Resize Video Resize and Convert Video
    Author:
    srikanth.anreddy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IVCompressor()
      Instance invokes with default encode settings and attributes

      This method helps in converting the video content to reduced size with lower resolution with user defined attributes Encodes the video with custom attributes thereby reducing the size of the video with better quality Maintains the best compressed quality

      This method helps in converting the video content to reduced size with lower resolution Encodes the video with default attributes thereby reducing the size of the video with better quality Maintains the best compressed quality

      This method attempts to resize the image byte stream to lower resolution Returns resized byte stream

      • reduceVideoSize

        public byte[] reduceVideoSize(byte[] data,
                              io.github.techgnious.dto.VideoFormats fileFormat)
                       throws io.github.techgnious.exception.VideoException
        This method helps in converting the video content to reduced size with lower resolution Encodes the video with default attributes thereby reducing the size of the video with better quality Maintains the best compressed quality
        Parameters:
        data - indicates the video content to be compressed
        fileFormat - to indicate the video type
        Returns:
        byte stream object with compressed video data
        Throws:
        io.github.techgnious.exception.VideoException - throws exception when the data is incompatible for the enconding
